name: Etihad Airways
goal:
Etihad Airways, the national airline of the United Arab Emirates, flies to over 90 passenger and cargo destinations worldwide from its base in Abu Dhabi.

Etihad Airways is part of the Etihad Aviation group that also holds minority equity investments
interests: Budget, Business and Industry, Climate Action, Competition, Consumers, Economy, finance and the euro, Employment and Social Affairs, Environment, External Relations, Foreign affairs and security policy, Institutional affairs, Single market, Trade, Transport
euInitiatives: Fair competition; Single European Skies; Climate Change; foreign direct investment, Strategic Aviation Package, Comprehensive Air Transport Agreements.
